About

Hi, we're Canopy Insurance.

We make it easy for brokers and businesses to offer a full range of insurance products that go beyond basic health coverage, filling in the gaps to boost employee wellness and security.

Sure, we provide insurance, but we really like to think of ourselves as your local ally—dedicated to making sure Alabama families get the best coverage and financial support possible.

Here's what you can expect from us:

  • Hassle-free service:

    We make it easy to work with us. Rapid quotes, flexible enrollment solutions, customizable benefit packages—you can expect concierge-level of support 110% of the time.

  • Strong network

    Our extensive network of vision and dental providers spans across Alabama and beyond.

  • Real people, real help

    When you call, you'll always speak to a real person—no bots or call trees—ready to help whatever you need.

  • A legacy you can trust

    We're backed by the Collateral family of companies, which has proudly served Alabama families since 1933.

  • A true partnership

    Need to adjust benefits? We'll work closely with you to evolve your offerings to meet the ever-changing needs of employees.

A strong benefits package is key to attracting and retaining top talent, and we're here to help you deliver just that. Let's work together to give your clients the best benefits and support around.
